law.text: Each member of the board shall take the oath prescribed by Section 228 of the Constitution.
law.history: Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 78, sec. 33. -- Amended 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 77, sec. 16. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 27, sec. 43. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4618-112, 4924.
